title: UAE Public Prosecution Engages in AI and Justice Dialogue at BRICS Meeting
description: The UAE Public Prosecution participated in the 7th BRICS Meeting on legal strategies involving artificial intelligence, under Brazil's chairmanship. The UAE emphasized its dedication to modern tech in legal processes and international cooperation, aiming at law enforcement, rights protection, and justice promotion, reaffirming ties with global partners.
content: The UAE Public Prosecution has taken an active role in the recent 7th Meeting of Heads of Prosecution Services of BRICS Countries, chaired by Brazil's Federal Public Prosecutor's Office. The virtual assembly explored the theme of 'Artificial Intellig... [1019 chars]

title: Tech Pledges From Trump’s UK Visit Will Test Strained Power Grid
description: Microsoft Corp. and OpenAI are among the US firms that have in recent days pledged to invest £31 billion ($41.8 billion) into artificial intelligence projects in Britain, but industry experts say the commitment could be undermined by the UK’s aging power grid and some of the world’s highest electricity prices.

title: How AI could help fight burnout
description: Burnout is a growing concern across industries. Artificial intelligence is quietly changing the game, but not always for the better.
content:
Burnout is a growing concern across industries, but artificial intelligence is quietly changing the game.

title: The Next Big Shift After Cloud, Why AI Infrastructure Is the Smartest Data Center Investment
description: The Future of Wealth Lies in Infrastructure Artificial intelligence is not just about apps and chatbots. The real opportunity lies in the infrastructure that powers it. content:

title: Goa to set up Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence (AI) hospitality
description: Goa to set up Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence (AI) hospitality
content:
